Sergei Prokofiev

Sonata no. 10 in E minor, op. 137

1953

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 1'

  • 1. Allegro moderato

Prokofiev only began the first movement of the sonata.

1. Allegro moderato

This movement is incomplete. The movement is based on the sonatina in E minor (op. 54 no. 1).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5
